item.title: Preprints
item.description: These contents are preprints and has not been peer-reviewed. Roy, S.; Anoop, A. Insights into the Active Catalyst Formation In Palladium Catalyzed Coupling Reaction From Di-Nuclear Palladium Acetate: A DFT Study. ChemRxiv 2022 Anoop, A.; Ganesh, V. The Role of Homoaromaticity in the Tropylium-Catalyzed Carboxylic Acid O-H Insertion with Diazoesters. ChemRxiv 2022. Khatun, M.; Paul, S.; Roy, S.; Dey, S.; Anoop, A. Small Gold-Thiolate Clusters Au3(SMe)3: Benchmarking of Density Functionals And Bonding Analysis.

item.title: Software
item.description: PyAR Python code for Aggregation and Reaction A free software for a) automated exploration of reactions between two reactants, b) automated workflow for prodicting the gemoetries of molecular aggregates and clusters. Download from github Install with python3 -m pip install git+https://github.com/anooplab/pyar.git and to upgrade: python3 -m pip install –upgrade git+https://github.com/anooplab/pyar.git

item.title: Journal articles
item.description: “Computational discovery of high-performance B–Al–Ga nanoclusters i for oxygen reduction reaction catalysis” Pratik Sarkar, Maya Khatun and Anakuthil Anoop, Physical Chemistry Chemical Physics, 2025, * *, “Computational Exploration of Small Hydrocarbon Networks: A Stochastic Generation and DFT Refinement Framework.” Sandip Giri, Sayon Satpati, Tarun Roy, Subhas Ghosal, Anakuthil Anoop, Journal of Computational Chemistry, 2025, 46(25), e70236. “Bonding and Stability in Six-Atom Nanoclusters of Boron, Aluminum, and Gallium” Maya Khatun, Pratik Sarkar, Sunanda Panda, and Anakuthil Anoop, Polyhedron, 2025.
